name: LD52 - Booty Harvesters
description:
Created in Godot 4 for Ludum Dare 52 - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/ol-booty

Game

Pirate ships are scattered around these seas. You’ve been hired by the English Royal Navy to tidy up the oceans. Sail through corpses of previous battles, harvesting their remains. Each item has a price and your ship can only hold so much. Loot all you can then scuttle. Return to the port to bank your booty.

How to play
  • W To accelerate your ship
  • S to decelerate
  • A / D turn left or right
  • Space to anchor
  • Q use your compass (Shows you direction to port)
  • E use your parrot (Shows you direction to closest Ship Wreck)
Music and sound effects
  • Minor part from Obra Dinn
  • Minor part from Sea Of Thieves
  • Rest by @valcin
Notes
  • Days are 8 hours long (8 minutes), not banking your booty in this time will incour losses
  • Don’t forget to scuttle a shipwreck after looting
  • Godot 4 has problems embedding into Itch/Ludum - Please download and run exe from the zip
Tools
  • Created in Godot 4
  • Aesprite
